46667.summary: Some customers in Scotch Creek are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46667.title: Feb 7 – Scotch Creek | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
